label: 扶桑略記
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: This voluminous historical record of the period from the legendary emperor Jinmu to the emperor Horikawa (r. 1086-1107) was compiled by the Tendai monk 皇円 Kōen (?-1169) sometime near the end of the Heian era.
